content.body: ljharb: we have some extra time on the agenda this meeting; if markm's around, do you think we could talk about next steps for making regex escape happen?
content.formatted_body: ljharb: we have some extra time on the agenda this meeting; if markm's around, do you think we could talk about next steps for making regex escape happen?

content.body: that is, assuming the next step for that proposal is "talk to the rest of the committee and settle on a design", rather than anything in particular which would need to be done in advance of the meeting
(or if anyone has other proposals blocked on similar "we just need to discuss and/or argue about it for a while" issues, this seems like a good time)
